description:
Luffy and his crew bid farewell to their new friends before setting off in search of the greatest adventures the New World has to offer!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enfin le départ. Au revoir, l’île des Hommes-Poissons !
Finally Time to Go! Goodbye, Fish-Man Island!
Наконец-то в путь! Прощай, Остров Рыболюдей!
حان وقت الذّهاب أخيرًا! الوداع يا جزيرة البرمائيّين
ついに出航! さよなら魚人島
